item.title: Download File and Save to a directory with Keyauth API
item.dc:creator: Afonso_Segredo
item.description:
lIMonkieIl:
std::vector<std::uint8_t> bytes = KeyAuthApp.download("167212");
	std::ofstream file("file.exe", std::ios_base::out | std::ios_base::binary);
	file.write((char*)bytes.data(), bytes.size());
	file.close();

thanks! solved the errors

Read full topic
item.source: Download File and Save to a directory with Keyauth API

item.title: Download File and Save to a directory with Keyauth API
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
std::vector<std::uint8_t> bytes = KeyAuthApp.download("167212");
	std::ofstream file("file.exe", std::ios_base::out | std::ios_base::binary);
	file.write((char*)bytes.data(), bytes.size());
	file.close();

this line from above

std::ofstream file("file.exe", std::ios_base::out | std::ios_base::binary);

change to your path example.

std::ofstream file("YourPathToSaveTheFileTo/file.exe", std::ios_base::out | std::ios_base::binary);

item.description:
if you read the example properly you would have found it

||// download file, change file.exe to whatever you want.|
||// remember, certain paths like windows folder will require you to turn on auto run as admin https://stackoverflow.com/a/19617989|
std::vector<std::uint8_t> bytes = KeyAuthApp.download(167212);|
std::ofstream file(file.exe, std::ios_base::out | std::ios_base::binary);|
file.write((char*)bytes.data(), bytes.size());|
file.close();|
github.com

KeyAuth/KeyAuth-CPP-Example/blob/main/main.cpp#L134

      
        
    
            
  1. 	for (std::string subs : KeyAuthApp.data.subscriptions)
    2. 
            
  2. 	{
    3. 
            
  3. 		if (subs == "default")
    4. 
            
  4. 		{
    5. 
            
  5. 			std::cout << skCrypt("\n User has subscription with name: default");
    6. 
            
  6. 		}
    7. 
            
  7. 	}
    8. 
            
  8. 	*/
    9. 
            
  9. 
            
    10. 

  10. 	/*
    11. 
            
  11. 	// download file, change file.exe to whatever you want.
    12. 
            
  12. 	// remember, certain paths like windows folder will require you to turn on auto run as admin https://stackoverflow.com/a/19617989
    13.

    14. 

  14. 	std::vector<std::uint8_t> bytes = KeyAuthApp.download("167212");
    15.

    16. 
            
  16. 	file.write((char*)bytes.data(), bytes.size());
    17. 
            
  17. 	file.close();
    18.

    19.

    21.
